Reviews.Title: “You get what you pay for!”
Reviews.Author: Dorothy A
Reviews.Content: cant remember 4th floor outside pretty grubby looking inside painting bad cleaned dirty cookware missing handles opener rusted burners stove didnt drip pans burners cleaned properly buying paper plates utensils bc dirty entire time doing construction pool owner failed tell wed waking sound jack hammer morning staff front dont staff owner serves maintenance guy dont waste money looked rundown motel leg

Reviews.Author: pddally7428
Reviews.Content: read reviews apprehensive free upgrade oceanfront stayed 303 excellent condition items surfing boards fishing clean offered beautiful view ocean staff extra days kept building slow elevators fine pool deck kept immaculate 4600 night bugs restaurant premises morning lunch meals
